data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Sucre prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sucre, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 645,736 people in the state of Sucre who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Sucre, Venezuela.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, 916,600 people live in the state of Sucre. Please, give them 183 new simple churches this year.
Lord, remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Make the Jew, Spanish-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, train the church of Sucre, Venezuela to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Sucre, Venezuela and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sucre, Venezuela has a population of 916,600.

We estimate Sucre has 111,444 people who might know Jesus, 645,736 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 159,420 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Sucre, Venezuela. Please, stir the 111,444 believers here to pray for awakening.
